content: As part of world logic day there's a conference called Formalise!(?) https://sites.google.com/view/wldzurich2021/startseite and the second half of the conference (in a couple of hours) will have me and also Paola Iannone/Athina Thoma talking about using Lean in education.
I take it their schedule has changed? I just joined for the 5pm talk by Peter and caught the last 30 seconds
Is there a link to view this later?
